lexUnit.name: summon.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: authoritatively call on (someone) to be present

sentence.text: A NURSE yesterday told how a colleague accused of murdering four children had been quick to summon help for a sick baby .
` Maverick limey has negotiated the hell-fire of the Brain and the almighty trail-boss Midwinter has summoned him for a special assignment . "

Poshekhonov could summon a short clear smile from Holly , a smile that was chained and brief .
